New Records: Son Heung-min scored his 40th goal for the national team
Jung Seung-hyun scored his first goal for the national team
Key Match Events: Hwang Hee-chan broke through China's defense with agile movements and earned a penalty
Son Heung-min scored a brace with goals in the 10th minute and 45th minute
Jung Seung-hyun headed in a goal from a free kick
South Korea's defensive solidness led to a clean sheet
Pre-Game Insights: Jurgen Klinsmann did not make significant changes to the starting XI
Korea showed solid cohesion and attacking ability
Post-Match Reflections: The win marked Korea's fifth consecutive victory
Korea's improved form under Klinsmann was noted
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Shenzhen Universiade Sports Centre
South Korea's defensive lineup was highlighted
